name: f_measure
author: Zhang, Min-Ling and Zhou, Zhi-Hua
title: A review on multi-label learning algorithms

parameter.name: beta
parameter.description: This parameter determines the importance of the precision. If the parameter is set 1, the f-measure is the harmonic mean of precision and recall. Values below 1 put more weight on precision whereas value above 1 put more weight on recall.
